So, what I think happened is she slept around with other guys hoping that could someone else could fill the void that he left in her heart, she also tried to fall in love in with others but that didn't work out either. You have to understand that sex has a emotional aspect to it too, when she had sex with other guys she didn't feel the pleasure that she felt from having sex with the dude she loved for years. So, if it makes you guys feel any better the MC gave her the most satisfaction out of any guys and that probably wasn't just because of his dick. Also look at this realistically, if you were in her position and had to find a way to move on, wouldn't you try and have hookups with others hoping that you could move on from a relationship that would probably never come to fruition? And does virginity really matter when it's basically all in the past? Not a lot of girls are virgins these days anyways. It's a 10/10 doujin for me, she moved on from being a slut to actually finding love.

Did she forget he's a damn teacher and he could get in trouble now? It also makes her love for him not seem that strong as she actually stopped actively pursuing him when she had the best chances of winning him over by getting to be his student. I know she explains it as her getting tired and trying to move on...but that still downplays her love for him with the fact that she had the best opportunity to finally get him then. Just seems like it's not consistent with her not being able to restrain herself later. I guess we could just say she tried to convince/delude herself that she could move on. Then again, I guess we'll just have to settle with she's a teenager and was confused...maybe just mad that he wouldn't see her as a

I kinda feel for her but at the same time i don't.

She was trying to sleep around and drown out her feelings for him and maybe find someone else that would make her fall in love and replace him in her heart but she never managed to find anyone.

Meanwhile i kinda feel like didn't even put proper effort into telling him how she felt in the first place, as it's been quite obvious that she was scared of getting rejected and never confessed how she felt until now.

As saying goes, if you don't speak up, you'll never get what you want so she was kinda putting her down by herself assuming that she isn't good enough for him.

With that said, this is pretty vanila and wholesome and i'm happy that her one-sided love finally became mutual. PS: The MC really reminds me of the guy from Uzaki Asobitai.
